Bistronomy blends a cozy, low-lit atmosphere with a vast selection of French wines and a modern, innovative menu that pays homage to classic French dishes. 64 Spring Street Charleston, SC Our Hours Monday, Wednesday, Thursday | 5pm - 9:30pm | Dinner Friday & Saturday | 4pm - 10pm | Dinner Sunday | 11am-2pm | Brunch | 2pm - 9:30pm | Dinner Weekly Specials Monday | Half-Off Burger Thursday 6 PM | Mercy of the Chef | Reservation Only Sunday | Brunch | 11am-2:30pm Special Events Select Saturdays Happy Hour Monday, Wednesday, Thursday | 5-6pm Friday-Sunday | 4-6pm House Wine $6 House Beer $6 Well Drink $6 Proper Champagne $15 Bottle of Veuve Clicquot 1/2-Off Select Food Items Contact Us 843-410-6221
